message.content:
cs.DB, cs.PL, cs.SE, cs.DC, cs.CR 

Reasoning: The paper discusses mechanisms for controlling access to data and integrating data of different schemas, which are core topics in database systems (cs.DB). The paper also proposes a new language-based approach for controlling and integrating decentralized data, which falls under the scope of programming languages (cs.PL) and software engineering (cs.SE). The paper also mentions the challenges of dealing with ambiguity in view updates, which is a topic in distributed computing (cs.DC) and security and privacy (cs.CR).
